description:
The main scope works are summarised by the following headings (please refer to the appended document for further details, including photographs and plans):
- Section 1: Complete refurbishment of the top floor (level 2) en-suite bathroom.
- Section 2: Conversion of 1st floor bathroom and separate toilet into a double bedroom.
- Section 3: Conversion of 1st half landing single bedroom (located on the 1st floor of the extension at the back of the property) into a family bathroom 
- Section 4: Update of house electrics- Section 5: Roof repairs.
- Section 6: Painting / Refurbishment of sash windows.- Section 7: Painting of front façade the paint of which is currently peeling off. 
- Section 8: Painting of front door (changing colour from existing green colour to grey) and updating / replacing ironmongery- Section 09: Repair of railings, including repair of cut railing (railing was cut during a bike theft incident)- Section 10: Damp proofing of under pavement vaults and re-rendering outside of the vaults in light well, where the damp has blown off the wall render.- Section 11: Removal of internal wall on lower ground floor load bearing wall, which currently separates kitchen from small study area, to create an open plan living space.
- Section 12: Remove gas fireplace and replace with solid fuel fireplace. Expose covered fireplace in Lower Ground Floor (in the current Study area) and install a solid fuel fireplace. 
A Install burglar alarm (bell located on front façade to be in similar position as neighbour's alarms)B.Internal painting and decorating throughout the property
